name: Night and Day (Virus40)
description:
This is my first 2D game that I’ve ever made, it has some basic concepts of just simply jumping, 2D side scrolling, and obstacles such as spikes and enemies. 

This also is just a basic game, with not really any level / character design. (May change in the future)

Planning on continuing my work and getting better in game making. This game may have some updates in the future, including shops / upgrades.

This game was used as a school project.
